name: Query Student Orcid Ids
query: SELECT DISTINCT pi.uid32 AS uid32, stu.uin AS id, CASE WHEN pi.last_name IS NOT NULL THEN pi.last_name ELSE stu.last_name END AS last_name, CASE WHEN pi.first_name IS NOT NULL THEN pi.first_name ELSE stu.first_name END AS first_name, stu.middle_name AS middle_name, stu.tamu_preferred_alias AS tamumail, class.amdbpatrongroupcode AS patron_group, stu.acad_dept AS acad_dept FROM patron.students stu LEFT OUTER JOIN patron.person_identifiers pi ON stu.uin = pi.uin LEFT OUTER JOIN patron.employees_retirees emp ON stu.uin = emp.uin, patron.classification class, patron.library_eresources eres WHERE stu.uin = eres.uin AND LTRIM(RTRIM(stu.classification)) = LTRIM(RTRIM(class.classification)) AND stu.currently_enrolled = 'Y' AND( (emp.employee_type = 1) OR (emp.uin IS NULL) OR (emp.employee_type IS NULL) OR ( emp.employee_type IN (2, 3) AND emp.title_code = '8491') ) AND class.amdbpatrongroupcode = 'grad' order by stu.uin
